alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 30 at 10:26AM CST until December 30 at 11:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM CST FOR JACKSON COUNTY... At 1025 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wade, or 14 miles northwest of Escatawpa, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Moss Point, St. Martin, Escatawpa, Gautier, D`iberville, Wade, Latimer, Big Point, Helena, Gulf Hills, Hurley, Vancleave, Gulf Park Estates and Hickory Hills. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 47 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
